history.content: Can you recommend a hotel in Amsterdam with consistently good reviews that stays within a reasonable budget? I don't need luxury.

Based on the available options, I would suggest staying at **The Modern Hideaway**. It offers consistent positive reviews regarding its amenities including room service, terrace, garden, free billiards, hot tub, and gym. While it's priced slightly higher than some other options, it provides a comfortable stay with reliable Wi-Fi and great customer service.
Can you also check if there's any discount or special offer for The Modern Hideaway during my visit?

Unfortunately, I don't have access to real-time pricing or discounts for specific hotels. However, you can usually find deals through online travel agencies (OTAs) or directly contacting the hotel's reservations department. They should be able to provide you with current rates and any available promotions.
Can you tell me more about the availability of rooms at The Modern Hideaway? I'm looking for a place where I can make a reservation soon.

I don't have real-time booking capabilities, so I cannot confirm the exact availability of rooms at The Modern Hideaway right now. However, based on the average occupancy rate of similar hotels in Amsterdam, it is likely that there will be available rooms. To get the most up-to-date information, you might want to contact the hotel directly or check their website for the latest availability.
Thank you, that was very helpful. That's all I needed, goodbye.
